script_logic.description: The script launches 1 MPI job, splitting the nodes defined in PBS_NODEFILE into 2 groups.
steps: Sets up the environment by loading necessary modules.
Changes directory to the job's working directory.
Copies the necessary files to separate folders for each job.
Creates a file containing the nodes for each job.
Launches the Python script 'main.py' on each set of nodes using a background process.
Waits for all jobs to complete.
